trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Clever | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Clever | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Clever with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Clever with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Clever
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Clever

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=551005).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP]For feedback, click [here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=551005).

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Clever.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Clever.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Clever tenant
trans-unit.target: A Clever tenant

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Clever will be able to single sign into the application at your Clever company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Clever will be able to single sign into the application at your Clever company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586)

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Clever
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Clever

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: Scenario
trans-unit.target: Scenario

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Clever
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Clever

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Clever.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Clever.

trans-unit.source: To enable the application integration for Clever, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To enable the application integration for Clever, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click **Active Directory**.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Active Directory

trans-unit.source: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the **Directory** list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click **Applications** in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: Applications
trans-unit.target: Applications

trans-unit.source: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Add application
trans-unit.target: Add application

trans-unit.source: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.
trans-unit.target: On the **What do you want to do** dialog, click **Add an application from the gallery**.

trans-unit.source: Add an application from gallerry
trans-unit.target: Add an application from gallerry

trans-unit.source: In the **search box**, type **Clever**.
trans-unit.target: In the **search box**, type **Clever**.

trans-unit.source: Application Gallery
trans-unit.target: Application Gallery

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select **Clever**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select **Clever**, and then click **Complete** to add the application.

trans-unit.source: Clever
trans-unit.target: Clever

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Clever with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Clever with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: Your Clever application expects the SAML assertions in a specific format, which requires you to add custom attribute mappings to your **saml token attributes** configuration.
trans-unit.target: Your Clever application expects the SAML assertions in a specific format, which requires you to add custom attribute mappings to your **saml token attributes** configuration.

trans-unit.source: The following screenshot shows an example for this.
trans-unit.target: The following screenshot shows an example for this.

trans-unit.source: Attributes
trans-unit.target: Attributes

trans-unit.source: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To configure single sign-on, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Clever** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the **Clever** application integration page, click **Configure single sign-on** to open the **Configure Single Sign On ** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Clever** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **How would you like users to sign on to Clever** page, select **Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On**, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Clever Sign On URL** textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign-on to your Clever application (e.g.: *https://clever.com/in/azsandbox*), and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure App URL** page, in the **Clever Sign On URL** textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign-on to your Clever application (e.g.: *https://clever.com/in/azsandbox*), and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Configure App URL
trans-unit.target: Configure App URL

trans-unit.source: On the **Configure single sign-on at Clever** page, to download your metadata, click **Download metadata**, and then save the metadata file locally on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the **Configure single sign-on at Clever** page, to download your metadata, click **Download metadata**, and then save the metadata file locally on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your Clever company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your Clever company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the toolbar, click **Instant Login**.
trans-unit.target: In the toolbar, click **Instant Login**.

trans-unit.source: Instant Login
trans-unit.target: Instant Login

trans-unit.source: On the **Instant Login** page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the **Instant Login** page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Instant Login
trans-unit.target: Instant Login

trans-unit.source: Type the **Login URL**.
trans-unit.target: Type the **Login URL**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The **Login URL** is a custom value.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The **Login URL** is a custom value.

trans-unit.source: You can get the actual value from your Clever support team.
trans-unit.target: You can get the actual value from your Clever support team.

trans-unit.source: As **Identity System**, select **ADFS**.
trans-unit.target: As **Identity System**, select **ADFS**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click **Complete** to close the **Configure Single Sign On** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Configure Single Sign-On
trans-unit.target: Configure Single Sign-On

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the top, click **Attributes** to open the **SAML Token Attributes** dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the menu on the top, click **Attributes** to open the **SAML Token Attributes** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Attributes
trans-unit.target: Attributes

trans-unit.source: To add the required attribute mappings, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To add the required attribute mappings, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: saml token attributes
trans-unit.target: saml token attributes

trans-unit.source: Attribute Name
trans-unit.target: Attribute Name

trans-unit.source: Attribute Value
trans-unit.target: Attribute Value

trans-unit.source: clever.student.credentials.district\_username
trans-unit.target: clever.student.credentials.district\_username

trans-unit.source: User.userprincipalname
trans-unit.target: User.userprincipalname

trans-unit.source: For each data row in the table above, click **add user attribute**.
trans-unit.target: For each data row in the table above, click **add user attribute**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Attribute Name** textbox, type the attribute name shown for that row.
trans-unit.target: In the **Attribute Name** textbox, type the attribute name shown for that row.

trans-unit.source: In the **Attribute Value** textbox, select the attribute value shown for that row.
trans-unit.target: In the **Attribute Value** textbox, select the attribute value shown for that row.

trans-unit.source: Click **Complete**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Complete**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Apply Changes**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Apply Changes**.

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Clever, they must be provisioned into Clever.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Clever, they must be provisioned into Clever.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Clever, provisioning is a manual task that needs to be performed by your Clever support team.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Clever, provisioning is a manual task that needs to be performed by your Clever support team.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use any other Clever user account creation tools or APIs provided by Clever to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use any other Clever user account creation tools or APIs provided by Clever to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: To assign users to Clever, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To assign users to Clever, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the **Clever **application integration page, click **Assign users**.
trans-unit.target: On the **Clever **application integration page, click **Assign users**.

trans-unit.source: Assign Users
trans-unit.target: Assign Users

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click **Assign**, and then click **Yes** to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see [Introduction to the Access Panel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn308586).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
